title: ITS SO GOOD - Dell XPS 13 9300 (2020) Review
description: The Dell XPS 13 is all-new for 2020 with the redesigned and upgraded 9300 model.  Its basically gone from a really good ultrabook to literally one of the best ultrabooks we've ever seen.  In this review we go over what's new, performance, battery life and more!   Buy items in this video from Amazon & our other partners at the links below:  Learn more about the Dell XPS 13 2020 -   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge as a loaner unit by Dell. This video is not sponsored. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #dellxps139300 #bestnotebook2020 #hardwarecanucks
